ygData.subject: RE: Song lock after lag spike
ygData.msgSnippet: Another method: I haven t really been able to consistently break the locked song by spamming the hotkey, but I was able to do so by pressing and holding the
ygData.messageBody:
Another method:

I haven't really been able to consistently break the locked song by spamming
the hotkey, but I was able to do so by pressing and holding the hotkey for
another song until the icon for the stuck one disappears.

Faras Tar'Linedhel
E'ci

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Lost Child [mailto:lostchild@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, August 11, 1999 9:22 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Song lock after lag spike
>
>
> From: "Lost Child" <lostchild@...>
>
> You can also mesh one of your song (hit the hotkey for one of
> your song
> about 15 times really really really fast) and that will
> unlock your song.
>
> >I've noticed that if I take a lag spike when singing,
> >it will lock the song in, and then I can't sing any
> >song until I get bashed, zone, or log off and back on.
